manpage.title: ovn-debug
manpage.p: ovn-debug -- Open Virtual Network debug tool
ovn-debug, OVN debug tool, is a tool to help with debugging of OVN setup.

dl.dd: Convert the logical flow stage name e.g. ls_in_lb into the logical flow table number e.g. 13.
Convert the logical flow stage name e.g. ls_in_lb into the OpenFlow table number e.g. 21.
